name: Type Conversion Helper Functions
description: Two nearly identical type conversion functions with same structure. Only difference is the target type (int64 vs int32).

snippets.description: Converts various integer types to int64
Converts various integer types to int32

notes: Identical structure with type switch handling int64, int32, int, uint64, uint32, uint. Only difference is return type and conversion targets. Could be refactored into a generic function.
